title: 1970 Colgate Red Raiders football team
text:
The 1970 Colgate Red Raiders football team was an <a href="American%20football">American football</a> team that represented <a href="Colgate%20University">Colgate University</a> as an independent during the <a href="1970%20NCAA%20University%20Division%20football%20season">1970 NCAA University Division football season</a>. In its third season under head coach <a href="Neil%20Wheelwright">Neil Wheelwright</a>, the team compiled a 5–6 record. John Lennon was the team captain. 
The team played its home games at <a href="Andy%20Kerr%20Stadium">Andy Kerr Stadium</a> in <a href="Hamilton%20%28village%29%2C%20New%20York">Hamilton, New York</a>.
Leading players.
